org.apache.hama.bsp.TaskAttemptID

  • Packages that use TaskAttemptID 
    Package Description
    org.apache.hama.bsp
    BSP computing framework.
    org.apache.hama.bsp.ft  
    org.apache.hama.bsp.message
    Contains the implementation of message transfer.
    org.apache.hama.bsp.message.queue
    Contains all queue implementations.
    org.apache.hama.bsp.sync
    Contains the base implementation of a barrier synchronization agent.
    org.apache.hama.ipc
    Tools to help define network clients and servers.
